amendment.description: Amendment limits the FAA's rulemaking authority on unmanned aerial vehicles (UAV's) if the rules do not take into consideration the agricultural applications of UAV's in the rulemaking process.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to issue, implement, or enforce regulations by the FAA for operations and certification of small unmanned aircraft systems in contravention to 14 CFR 21.25 (b)(1).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A067) offered by Mr. Newhouse.
